Maserati MC12 | Corsa designer = sp = us }} The 'Ferrari FXX' is a high performance race car and prototype built by automobile manufacturer Ferrari in Maranello, Italy. The FXX is based on the street- legal Enzo. Production of the FXX began in 2005.
